name: Mr.Cannon
description:
※ Swipe to control Mr.Cannon and upgrade your weapon to blow up your enemy
※ Classic ball-shooting games!
※ Unlock the awesome backgrounds and characters to collect more fun!
※ Easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics
※ Hard levels and even harder levels! More soon!
※ Relaxing gameplay but also challenging for all ages!
